Package tud.iir.web

Interface Summary
CrawlerCallback  
 

Class Summary
ConnectionTimeout The ConnectionTimeout is necessary because Java does not set timeouts when a server starts sending data and stops without sending an end signal.
Crawler The Crawler downloads pages from the web.
CrawlThread  
FeedFinder The FeedFinder downloads links to feeds on the web and stores them in the database.
RankAggregation The RankAggregation combines multiple ranked lists into one.
SourceAggregator A collection of source aggregation algorithms.
SourceRetriever The SourceRetriever queries the indices of Yahoo!
SourceRetrieverManager The SourceRetrieverManager holds information about query settings and statistics for indices of Yahoo!
URLStack  
WebResult
